Package com.hexaware.dao

Class DaoClass

java.lang.Object
com.hexaware.dao.DaoClass
public class DaoClass extends Object
The DaoClass provides methods to perform data access operations for various entities like Employee, FinancialRecord, Payroll, and Tax.

    • CalculateTaxDao

      public void CalculateTaxDao(Tax tax)
      Calculates and stores tax information for an employee using data access operations. This method inserts tax details into the database. It takes a Tax object as input and stores its attributes (tax ID, employee ID, tax year, taxable income, and tax amount) into the 'tax' table in the database.
      Parameters:
      tax - The Tax object containing tax information to be stored.
